text: Oh nina enikholwayo! Labo abasezandleni zenu zangakwezokudla (izigqila) kanye nalabo abangakathombi mabacele imvume kunina ezikhathi ezintathu ngaphambi komthandazo wasekuseni nangesikhathi nikhumula izingubo zenu ntambama nangemumva komthandazo wakusihlwa (lezi) yizikhathi ezintathu zenu zokuba nibe nodwa, ngezinye izikhathi ngaphandle kwalezi alikho icala kunina nakubona uma behamba phakathi kwenu abanye benu besiza abanye, kanjalo-ke uMvelinqangi uyanicacisela amavesi futhi uMvelinqangi ungowaziyo onobuhlakani
